title: S3 Ep114: Ms. Frizzle Appreciation Episode: Friday, June 26, 2020
itunes:title: Ms. Frizzle Appreciation Episode: Friday, June 26, 2020
description:
• Emma Roberts Is Pregnant, Expecting Her 1st Child With Boyfriend Garrett Hedlund (US Magazine)
  • Elizabeth Banks Cast as Ms. Frizzle in The Magic School Bus Live-Action Film (PEOPLE) CORRECTION: The Magic School Bus in fact was an animated series. Jackie apologizes for her error
  • Dixie Chicks change their name, dropping the 'Dixie' (NY Post)
  • Billie Lourd Is Engaged to Austen Rydell: 'She Said Duhhh' (PEOPLE)
  • Tyler Perry Donates Van to Atlanta-Based Women's Organization That Helps People Experiencing Homelessness (PEOPLE)
  • Kelly's Mindless News (PEOPLE)
The Morning Toast with Claudia (@girlwithnojob) and Jackie Oshry (@jackieoproblems)
Merch: https://shopmorningtoast.com/
